findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is marked as external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have any access modifiers or checks, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access and potential token draining.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as External and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected 'mint' Function
findings.description: The 'mint' function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it potentially vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in skim function

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function does not have any access modifiers and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized state changes.
